summary: Completed testing P1.1 Admin Connections UI Polish and P1.2 Radar/Compare UX fixes. P1.2 features working excellently with all radar interactions, compare mode, and table sorting functional. P1.1 features partially verified but blocked by authentication session persistence issues.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Session expires quickly, requires repeated login

integration_issues.issue: Admin session does not persist across page navigations

passed_tests: P1.2 Radar page loads correctly with 'Early Signal Radar' title - ✅
P1.2 Compare button found and activates compare mode - ✅
P1.2 Compare mode banner shows 'Select 2 accounts' message - ✅
P1.2 Radar and Table view toggles work properly - ✅
P1.2 Table sorting by Early Signal, Accel, Influence functional - ✅
P1.2 Filter buttons (Retail, Influencer, Whale, Breakout, Rising) work - ✅
P1.2 Stats display shows breakout and rising counts correctly - ✅
P1.2 Radar SVG chart renders with colored account bubbles - ✅
P1.2 Hover tooltips appear on radar bubbles without resetting selection - ✅
P1.2 Alpha Zone highlighted in radar with proper labeling - ✅
P1.2 Legend shows different signal types (Breakout, Rising, No Signal) - ✅
P1.2 Refresh button present and functional - ✅
P1.1 Admin login works with admin/admin12345 credentials - ✅
P1.1 Admin Connections page structure visible when authenticated - ✅
P1.1 Four tabs present: Overview, Config, Stability, Alerts - ✅
P1.1 Module Status section with ENABLED/HEALTHY badges visible - ✅
P1.1 Activity cards with statistics (134 accounts, 15 signals, etc.) visible - ✅
P1.1 Data source selection buttons (Mock, Sandbox, Twitter Live) present - ✅
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin authentication session persistence issue. The admin login works but sessions expire too quickly, requiring frequent re-authentication. This prevents thorough testing of P1.1 admin features. Consider implementing proper session management or extending session timeout.

success_percentage.backend: 85% - Admin APIs work when authenticated, but session management needs improvement
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - P1.2 Radar/Compare features working excellently, P1.1 admin UI visible but authentication flow needs fixing
